content

  • the first difficulty will be parsing the books in order to remove all prose and leave only poetry;

  • I’ll first try to do it programmatically, but if that doesn’t work I’ll make tests with a limited corpus and do everything manually;

  • initial books list: aeneid by virgil, poems by ts elliot, golden treasury by various poets, poems by keats, leaves of grass by walt whitman, poems by rowley, lyrics by sapho, the wasteland by elliot, odissey by homer

  • first tests will be just concatenating random stanzas from the parsed text

  • it would be nice to have content from poets not on the public domain, but that might be a bit harder
